{ e.stopPropagation(); }} >
About this dashboard

This dashboard explores the relationship between{" "} COVID-19 and{" "} GDP growth for a selected set of countries.

Data sources:

  • COVID-19 daily series from WHO / Pomber dataset.
  • Country-level GDP growth from TradingEconomics (API key protected), with World Bank fallback where needed.

How to read the charts:

  • Use the date range pills (30d / 90d / 1y / Max) to zoom in on recent periods.
  • The 7-day average option smooths out reporting noise, similar to how stock dashboards smooth daily volatility.
  • Trend arrows on the summary cards indicate whether a metric is rising, falling, or roughly flat over the most recent window.

Built as a front-end dashboard project, focusing on data visualization, API integration, and UX polish rather than back-end services.
